description.value:
Frequency once per day

Seeing your allies falter, you fill their hearts with your unbreakable hope, rousing them to stay in the fight. All allies within 60 feet that are dying, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] and wounded, are healed a number of Hit Points equal to three times your level. Then, all allies within 60 feet that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] may stand up as a free action that does not provoke reactions.
